articles.author: CBS News
articles.title: After being paralyzed skiing, this 20-year-old competed in his first marathon
articles.description: Mason Branstrator's life changed when he was paralyzed at 17. But that hasn't stopped him from playing sports and competing in a marathon. Mason, 20, just completed the wheelchair race at Grandma's Marathon in Duluth, Minnesota.
articles.content:

articles.author: Mark Schlabach
articles.title: Basketball players sue NCAA over NIL use in March Madness promos - ESPN
articles.description: A group of former college basketball players have sued the NCAA, multiple conferences and Turner Sports for the unauthorized use of NIL in March Madness highlights.
articles.content: A group of 16 former men's college basketball players, including Kansas stars Mario Chalmers and Sherron Collins, UConn guard Byan Boatright and Arizona guard Jason Terry, have sued the NCAA and mult… [+3811 chars]
